# ion-list-header
List header a header component for a list.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### color

string

The color to use for the background.


#### mode

string

The mode determines which platform styles to use.
Possible values are: `"ios"` or `"md"`.

string

The mode determines which platform styles to use.
